response.original_title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters- The Yunnan Temple
response.overview: In a sequence both majestic and horrifying, the larva who will become Mothra, Queen of the Monsters, emerges from her egg sack beneath a megalithic pyramid towering above China's primordial rainforest. Discover how this stunning sequence - and the ancient Yunnan Temple where it takes place - were created.
response.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters- The Yunnan Temple
